text: Difficulty starting a new yearObjectively   was a really great year for me in terms of my uni studies  finding part time work that was relevant to my degree  getting a raise at my first workplace and starting a relationship with a really wonderful guy  I ve always been quite close with my family and have loving  supportive friends  There are a reasonable amount of people I care about and I know care for me too I know that I am living a life others may never get to experience and I am truly thankful for everything that s happened in   and proud of myself for getting through all the challenges when I thought I couldn t   But I simply can t see myself starting a new year and having to go through everything again  I just can t  I can t formulate any clear goals to work towards for this year  I can t feel any drive or motivation  I can t see a future when I used to be able to  and every year feels more difficult to get through than the last  even though  objectively  I always seem to be moving onwards and upwards  I ll break my family and loved ones  hearts if I let them know about how I feel right now   How much easier would it be to leave all this behind if I weren t so attached to these people in my life  I feel trapped and just want to leave everything so I can be this little soul that flits about into everywhere and nowhere  that feels nothing and only observes what happens in this world
summary: Last year was a great year for her. She got a raise at her first workplace and started a relationship with a wonderful guy. She has a lot of people in her life that she cares about. She doesn't want to start a new year without having to go through everything again. She can't see a future.
cleaned: year great year get raise workplace start relationship wonderful guy lot people life care not want start new year have not future

text: I m honestly done th of March is when I ll be gone Ah  a friend suggested this subreddit and I realised my reasons are so minuscule they might as well not be reasons or even exist in the first place   Anyways  off I go on the longest ramble in history    When I was   I had made a promise that I would kill myself by time I was   and in a couple of weeks I will be  so I need to hurry up  I honestly don t know why I wanted to do that but eh  I was   let s hope I was joking  I thought of the cliche thing to do it on Friday the  th in April but that s a week to my birthday and I don t need that pressure  As for the other reasons I want to ahem kick the bucket  lately everyone has been pressuring me to hurry up and get some sort of place in a university quickly before I loose the chance  I would have   years before I would have to attend and besides we all know I won t last that long  I can t remember the last time where I was happy and wasn t on medication  I can remember plenty when I was on quite a lot of medication but none naturally  Lastly  I m just generally done  I ll grab my box that s full of blades  grab my pill bottle  grab the note I ve been writing since I was   and honestly it s more like a book or short story because of everything I ve put in it  And let s hope  let s hope that I don t survive  I ve survived too many times
summary: A friend suggested this subreddit. He wants to kill himself before his birthday on Friday the th of March. He also wants to get some sort of place in a university before he loses the chance to attend it. He doesn't remember the last time he was happy without medication.

text: Everyday waiting for my life to endHi all I just feel like I need to get this all off my chest  otherwise my heart will explode Ever since I remember all I wanted in life was to  find someone who would love me  I m   and I ve never ever been loved  By anyone  I was in love  but the feeling was never reciprocated  I thought that this would come with time  but it never happened  It makes me so depressed I can t breath  Literally  I force myself to get up everyday and to go through another day  Somewhere in the back of my head I hoped that the miracle would happen and i would find someone  But I can t take it anymore  I ve lost so much time  there s so many things I ve never done and will never do because it s too late  I feel like even if I meet someone  they would leave me ASAP because I was alone so long that it just fucked me up   I started cutting  I am ashamed of it  I promised myself I would only cut one of my thighs so nobody would ever know  Every time I look at the bruises it reminds my of how fucked up my life is  But is not enough  It doesn t help me anymore  I just want to die  everyday I hope that it all will be over  Death would be a salvation but I feel like I don t even deserve it and I m just punished for being who I am   I wish I could just kill myself  But I can t even do that properly
